sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-col class="justify-center d-flex">
    <v-btn @click="drawer = !drawer" class="align-self-start" style="position: fixed">
      HHHHH
    </v-btn>
    <transition name="slide-fade">
      <v-card v-if="drawer" class="mt-5 elevation-24 rounded-xl mx-auto d-flex justify-center"  style="width: 75vw;" color="greeting-background">
        <v-carousel
            continuous
            cycle
            interval="5000"
            hide-delimiter-background
            delimiter-icon="mdi-guitar-pick"
            show-arrows-on-hover
            height="58vh"
            class="rounded-xl ma-1"
        >
          <v-carousel-item
              class="rounded-xl"
              v-for="(slide, i) in slides"
              :key="i"
              :src="slide"
          >
          </v-carousel-item>

        </v-carousel>
      </v-card>
    </transition>
  </v-col>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "TheIndexViewCarousel",
  data: () => ({
    drawer: false,
    colors: [
      'green',
      'secondary',
      'yellow darken-4',
      'red lighten-2',
      'orange darken-1',
    ],
    labels: [
        "nu-metal",
        "old-school"
    ],
        slides: [
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_metallica.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_slipknot.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_lamb_of_god.png"),
          require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel.png")
    ],
  }),
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
